name: RideOp - Thrill Ride Simulator
detailed_description:
RideOp Deluxe Edition


Deluxe edition includes:

- Exclusive ride "Disk'o Coaster". Put your guests through a hurricane of emotions with this fun and enjoyable ride. Control the spin as well as the lateral movement with speeds up to 70km/h!

- Choose the music: Now you can listen to different music tracks while you play. You choose your style.

- Free expansion pack: Get free access to our first RideOp's DLC.

- 10 High Resolution desktop backgounds from the game. With 4K image resolution now you can look at your favourite ride every time you turn on the computer!


Important: All these features will become gradually available during the Early Access and Full Release period of the game and may not be immediately included at the time of purchase.


About the Game



RideOp is a new simulation game that puts you in control of some of the biggest and most thrilling theme park rides in the world.

Open the gates, check the restraints and give all your guests the most unforgettable experience! With full control of the ride's motion, you can offer a unique journey every ride.

Watch out for the safety of your guests! Make sure the loading and unloading gates are properly close, all the restraints are locked and checked and make sure the intensity of the ride is not set to "astronaut's training program" or you might find an unpleasant surprise on the floor from one or more of your guests that you will have to take care of.

As in real life, weather will play an important factor in some rides. High speed winds could endanger the safety of your riders so the ride's computer will shut down the system if the meteorology makes impossible to operate the ride safely.

Are you up for the challenge? Explore the different game modes and complete all your duties in the time given to earn experience points. Don't make the guests wait too much in the queue or they could start to run out of Instagram photos to like on their phones and start complaining!



-Fully modelled rides with loading/unloading platforms, entry queue and a fully functional control cabin with the ride's operation panel.

-Highly detailed guests to ride your thrilling machines with many different animations and reactions.

-Realistic environment to immerse yourself even more.



-Sandbox: Where you can explore the ride controls without a time pressure, perfect for beginners and people who want to enjoy every part of the ride experience.

-Challenge: Do you think you can complete all the tasks on time? Use your practice and knowledge of the ride to deliver the best best experience for your guests in the most efficient time and earn points that will help you grow in your career and unlock additional content.

-Ride Customizations: Tired of operating the same ride over and over? Change the colours and try the different variations for each ride model.




Now it's your turn to create thrilling experiences!

short_description: RideOp puts you in control of some of the biggest and most thrilling theme park rides in the world. Give all your guests the most unforgettable experience! With full control of the ride's motion, you can offer a unique journey every ride. Now it's your turn to create thrilling experiences!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit or higher
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 5750 1Gb VRAM / Intel HD4400 / NVidia Geforce 640 1Gb VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit or higher
  • Processor: Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X 2Gb VRAM / Intel HD4400 / NVIDIA 760 series 2Gb VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
